<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Walls Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wand-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de Murs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Das Paredes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Delle Pareti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα τοίχων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto De las Paredes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this project, you'll learn about different kinds of walls and discover interesting things about them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">walls</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Projekt erlernen Sie über 
unterschiedliche Arten der Wände und entdecken interessante Sachen 
über sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce projet, vous vous renseignerez sur 
différents genres de murs et découvrirez des choses intéressantes 
au sujet d'elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste projeto, você aprenderá sobre tipos 
diferentes das paredes e descobrirá coisas interessantes sobre elas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo progetto, imparerete circa i generi 
differenti di pareti e scoprirete le cose interessanti circa loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το πρόγραμμα, θα μάθετε για τα διαφορετικά 
είδη τοίχων και θα ανακαλύψετε τα ενδιαφέροντα πράγματα για τα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este proyecto, usted aprenderá sobre diversas 
clases de paredes y descubrirá cosas interesantes sobre ellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
